title: Chapter 1494 - The Welcoming Grounds
body:
Chapter 1494 - The Welcoming Grounds

Gradually, Su Yi came back into view. The yellow-robed middle-aged man and his companions rushed over to welcome him.

The way they looked at Su Yi had already shifted dramatically.

“Do you recognize this person?” Su Yi flicked his fingertip, and a beam of light rose, displaying the visage of the man in blood-colored robes.

Someone immediately said, “I know him! He’s Elder Qian Xuefeng from the Western Chill Star Domain’s Divine Spirit Immortal Sect!”

“Someone from the Western Chill Star Domain!” The others’ expressions darkened.

“There’s absolutely no way we can just let this go!”

“That old scoundrel violated the rules of the First Battleground! He must be severely punished!”

Everyone was talking at once, and everyone was furious.

“I already killed him,” Su Yi said casually.

Deathly silence immediately ensued. Everyone practically jumped in fright. You killed him!?

“Fellow Daoist, if he’s dead, it’ll be hard to prove that you were in the right,” the middle-aged man in yellow said with obvious concern. “According to the rules, no matter how great your grudge, no one is to be punished without an investigation.”
